title: Exchange NFT for physical product.
description:
Pre-selling physical products as NFTs unlocks many new business models.

There is currently no public tooling to achieve this.
solution:
Create open source functionality and docs.

 NFTs give access to a smart contract. This automates an order to manufacture and/or deliver.
experience:
Building an NFT fashion brand on Cardano.

8 Years in marketing - Currently writing for IO.

Looking to hire Plutus Pioneer to develop.
